comments.body: Please, add test description - something that explains the scenario you are testing.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +115,119 @@	testCases := []struct {
		desc    string
		input   []byte
		prefix  Transformer
		metrics []string

comments.body:
Why not use the actual identity transformer.
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/value/encrypt/identity/identity.go

the context we used in test is not implementing https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/70ed851360e89742a6ed020b4d71499e1913af46/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/storage/value/transformer.go#L32.
Having two different errors with the same message is confusing.
